docs.snippet: U.S. stocks ended higher on Friday, with both the Dow and S&P 500 closing at records in a broad rally, though trading was light with many market participants still out for the Christmas holiday....

headline.main: Wall Street Ends at Record in Second Straight Weekly Gain
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Ends at Record in Second Straight Weekly Gain

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks ended higher on Friday, with both the Dow and S&P 500 closing at records in a broad rally, though trading was light with many market participants still out for the Christmas holiday.

docs.snippet: Brazil's state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA and some of its executives were hit with a U.S. class action lawsuit by investors in $98 billion of the company's securities over an alleged kickback and bribery scheme....

headline.main: Petrobras Hit With U.S. Class Action Suit Over $98 Billion in Securities
headline.print_headline: Petrobras Hit With U.S. Class Action Suit Over $98 Billion in Securities

docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA and some of its executives were hit with a U.S. class action lawsuit by investors in $98 billion of the company's securities over an alleged kickback and bribery scheme.

docs.snippet: Two short-term projects are planned to ease traffic problems near Gonzales....

headline.print_headline: New Lanes Planned Near La. Hwy 30 and I-10

docs.snippet: At least nine people were killed and 10 others were missing in mudslides triggered by heavy rains Friday in the central hills of Sri Lanka, officials said....

headline.main: 9 Killed, 10 Missing in Sri Lanka Mudslides
headline.print_headline: 9 Killed, 10 Missing in Sri Lanka Mudslides

docs.lead_paragraph: At least nine people were killed and 10 others were missing in mudslides triggered by heavy rains Friday in the central hills of Sri Lanka, officials said.

docs.snippet: U.S. law enforcement agencies are a long way from being able to effectively track threats of the kind a gunman posted on Instagram before his execution-style murder of two New York City policemen last weekend....

headline.main: U.S. Police Struggle to Uncover Threats on Social Media
headline.print_headline: U.S. Police Struggle to Uncover Threats on Social Media

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. law enforcement agencies are a long way from being able to effectively track threats of the kind a gunman posted on Instagram before his execution-style murder of two New York City policemen last weekend.

docs.snippet: In an interview, Mr. Lurie shared some of his thoughts about AT&T’s future and the state of the wireless industry and those “supercookies.”...

headline.main: A Conversation With Glenn Lurie, AT&T Mobility's New Chief

docs.abstract: In an interview, Mr. Lurie shared some of his thoughts about AT&T’s future and the state of the wireless industry and those “supercookies.”

docs.snippet: A Palestinian man on Friday stabbed and lightly wounded two Israeli paramilitary border policemen at the entrance to Jerusalem's Old City on Friday, Israeli police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Palestinian man on Friday stabbed and lightly wounded two Israeli paramilitary border policemen at the entrance to Jerusalem's Old City on Friday, Israeli police said.

docs.snippet: The transit police officers who helped deliver a Christmas baby on a subway train reunited with the newborn boy and his parents Friday morning, trading the chaos of the dingy rail car where they first met for the comfort of a hospital room....

headline.main: Officers Help Deliver Baby on Train on Christmas
headline.print_headline: Officers Help Deliver Baby on Train on Christmas

docs.lead_paragraph: The transit police officers who helped deliver a Christmas baby on a subway train reunited with the newborn boy and his parents Friday morning, trading the chaos of the dingy rail car where they first met for the comfort of a hospital room.

docs.snippet: China's leaders underscored their support for Hong Kong's unpopular leader as he visited Beijing on Friday in the wake of pro-democracy protests in the southern Chinese city....

headline.main: Chinese Leaders Reiterate Support for HK Leader
headline.print_headline: Chinese Leaders Reiterate Support for HK Leader

docs.lead_paragraph: China's leaders underscored their support for Hong Kong's unpopular leader as he visited Beijing on Friday in the wake of pro-democracy protests in the southern Chinese city.

docs.snippet: Vietnam's soccer federation has banned nine players for life for fixing an Asian club match, part of efforts to win back dwindling confidence of fans and rebuild a reputation tarnished by bribery scandals....

headline.main: Vietnam Gets Tough With Life Bans for Match-Fixers
headline.print_headline: Vietnam Gets Tough With Life Bans for Match-Fixers

docs.lead_paragraph: Vietnam's soccer federation has banned nine players for life for fixing an Asian club match, part of efforts to win back dwindling confidence of fans and rebuild a reputation tarnished by bribery scandals.
